nodes.text: It's a nice chest - there's a good lock on it. It's promising some nice treasure.
It looks like a Columbo class lock... It requires a methodical approach to solving it.
There's nothing as disappointing as an empty chest.
I think it would be kind of hard to run while carrying this thing around. And with the monsters I've seen here, I'm sure I'll need to run sometime.
It's a nice, new lock with hardly any rust on it.
I'll just have to use my nifty tools to jimmy this open.
Okay, let's see what we got here...
Trouble is, I don't have anything suitable for that.
Huh... it's a bottle of Magic Protection pills.
There were a couple of Magical Bandages in the chest - were.
Then there are a few coins for me to pick up...
That's it, this is now an empty chest.
Something in this chest is magical, I'm sure of it.
Okay, there may be a faint trace... but I'm sure it's just left over from the pills and bandages.
